misc: Known for bomb drives despite his advanced age.
biography: Harri, affectionately known in golfing circles as "the doctor", is a familiar and respected figure at the Hector Trophée. Representing Hattula Golf, Harri brings a wealth of experience to the competition, marking Hector Trophée 2025 as his sixth appearance.

Despite his advanced age, Harri is renowned for his surprisingly bomb drives, a testament to his enduring power and technique. He has secured the coveted Hector Trophée on two occasions, showcasing his ability to perform under pressure and his strategic prowess in the pair format.

While the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, Harri's consistent performance and dedication to the sport make him a formidable competitor. His fellow players admire him for his sharp mind and encyclopedic knowledge of the game. He remains an active and influential presence in the Hector Trophée community.
